channel.description: Boot Grub2 Kernel Review Questions Q. UEFI is replacing BIOS in newer computers. True or False? A. True. Q. You have changed the timeout value in the grub configuration file located in the /etc/default/ directory. Which command would you run now to ensure the change takes effect on next system reboots? A. grub2-mkconfig Q. You want to view the parameters passed to the kernel at boot time. Which virtual file would you look at? A. /proc/cmdline
